text: Ujjivan SMS Banking is a service that enables customers to make enquiries using SMS codes provided by the Bank.

elements.text: Are there any charges associated with Ujjivan SMS Banking?

text: The Bank does not charge its customers for Ujjivan SMS Banking. However, standard SMS charges will be applicable as per your telecom service provider.

elements.text: Do I have to register my mobile number with the Bank for using Ujjivan SMS Banking?

text: Yes, your mobile number needs to be registered with the Bank for using Ujjivan SMS Banking.

elements.text: What are the services offered by Ujjivan SMS Banking? What are the SMS codes for those services?

text:
Ujjivan SMS Banking services and codes that must be sent to 9243232121 are as follows:






Services offered
SMS Code if a customer has a  single account with the Bank
SMS Code if customer has more than one account with the Bank


Balance enquiry
BAL
BAL <last four digits of account number>


Mini statement
MIN
MIN <last four digits of account number>


Know customer ID
CUST
CUST


Fixed deposit enquiry
FDE
FDE <last four digits of account number>


Recurring deposit enquiry
RDE
RDE <last four digits of account number>


Cheque book request
CBR
CBR <last four digits of account number>


Cheque status enquiry
CHQ<cheque number>
CHQ <cheque number>
